content: Once you cross the giant pit by way of the fallen pillar, take out the Monk Supporter on the other side, and work your way up the path. Another Monk Supporter can be found on the higher path leading out of a cave and back outside, but beware of a Cyan Bat lurking above.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White'.
The content is as follows:
Once you cross the giant pit by way of the fallen pillar, take out the Monk Supporter on the other side, and work your way up the path. Another Monk Supporter can be found on the higher path leading out of a cave and back outside, but beware of a Cyan Bat lurking above.
